suncertify.db

Interface DBAccessExtended

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DBAccess
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Data, DataProxy

    public interface DBAccessExtended
extends DBAccess
    This interface is used to add additional methods to ones provided in DBAccess interface
    Author:
    Robbie Byrne

    • Method Summary

      long getCookie()
      This method returns the clients cookie

      This method returns the fields of a record

      Checks if the passed record is locked or unlocked.

      • isLocked

        boolean isLocked(long recNo)
                 throws RecordNotFoundException
        Checks if the passed record is locked or unlocked.
        Parameters:
        recNo - record to check
        Returns:
        Returns true if the record pass is locked, false otherwise
        Throws:
        RecordNotFoundException
